com.polarion.alm.builder

Interface IBuildInformationRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IReadableRepository, IWatchableRepository, IWritableRepository

    public interface IBuildInformationRepository
extends IReadableRepository, IWritableRepository, IWatchableRepository
    Build information repository.

    Only for real builds, not calculations.

    Author:
    Stepan Roh, Polarion Software

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.polarion.alm.builder.IWatchableRepository

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectBuildLocation

        ILocation getProjectBuildLocation(IBuildArtifact artifact,
                                  java.lang.String id)
        Folder which should hold build information of given artifacts's build (identified by build id).

        There is always some location returned even if it does not exist in repository.

        Typically the location is in the form projects/PROJECT_NAME/GROUP_ID/ARTIFACT_ID/ID.

        Parameters:
        artifact - build artifact
        id - build id
        Returns:
        artifact build location (not null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if artifact is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if artifact's group entity is not project

      • getBuildLocation

        ILocation getBuildLocation(IObjectId buildId)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Returns location of the build folder if it is found, otherwise null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        3.7.3

      • getContextIdForLocation

        IContextId getContextIdForLocation(ILocation loc)
        Return id of context (project) which has its builds stored on given location.

        Applies to sublocations of getProjectBuildLocation(IBuildArtifact, String) too (which may in fact be missing from repository - it is important that at least project build location exists).

        Parameters:
        loc - location
        Returns:
        context id or null if this is not project build location
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if loc is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if loc is relative

      • addProjectBuildsListener

        void addProjectBuildsListener(IWatchableRepositoryListener l,
                              java.util.Collection locations)
        Similar to IWatchableRepository.addWatchableRepositoryListener(IWatchableRepositoryListener, java.util.Collection), but will watch given relative locations in all present or future project build folders.

        Listener can be removed with standard IWatchableRepository.removeWatchableRepositoryListener(IWatchableRepositoryListener).

        If given set of locations is empty, then does nothing.

        If listener was already added, its registered set of locations is merged with given set.

        For catching the creation of new build (creation of project build folder), location with empty path can be used.

        WARNING: In cluster setup listener is notified only on the node where the build runs.

        Parameters:
        l - listener
        locations - Collection of ILocations
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if locations is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if l is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if some location is absolute

      • stuffProjectBuildsListener

        void stuffProjectBuildsListener(IWatchableRepositoryListener l,
                                java.util.Collection locations,
                                long lastKnownModificationTime)
        Similar to IWatchableRepository.stuffWatchableRepositoryListener(IWatchableRepositoryListener, Collection, long), but following contract of addProjectBuildsListener(IWatchableRepositoryListener, Collection).
        Parameters:
        l - listener
        locations - Collection of ILocations and IWatchableRepository.ILocationWithTimes
        lastKnownModificationTime - last modification time of known changes (exclusive; use 0 for indication that every change is wanted)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if locations is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if l is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if some location is absolute
